notebooks.name: Subset CONUS and run ParFlow
notebooks.description: Subsets data from the CONUS1 modeling domain stored on Hydrodata as well as climate forcing to perform a simulation with ParFlow-CLM, that is ParFlow fully coupled to the climate model.

notebooks.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
notebooks.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)

notebooks.name: Subset CONUS and do a ParFlow Spinup
notebooks.description: Subsets all static inputs from a CONUS1 run stored in Hydrodata and performs a spinup simulation (without forcing)
